mn11:10.1.pli: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sabbupādānapariññāvādā paṭijānamānā.
mn11:10.1.en: There are some ascetics and brahmins who claim to propound the complete understanding of all kinds of grasping.

mn11:10.6.pli: Tasmā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā sabbupādānapariññāvādā paṭijānamānā;
mn11:10.6.en: That’s why they claim to propound the complete understanding of all kinds of grasping,

mn11:11.1.pli: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sabbupādānapariññāvādā paṭijānamānā.
mn11:11.1.en: There are some other ascetics and brahmins who claim to propound the complete understanding of all kinds of grasping,

mn11:11.6.pli: Tasmā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā sabbupādānapariññāvādā paṭijānamānā;
mn11:11.6.en: That’s why they claim to propound the complete understanding of all kinds of grasping,

mn11:12.1.pli: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sabbupādānapariññāvādā paṭijānamānā.
mn11:12.1.en: There are some other ascetics and brahmins who claim to propound the complete understanding of all kinds of grasping,

mn11:12.6.pli: Tasmā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā sabbupādānapariññāvādā paṭijānamānā;
mn11:12.6.en: That’s why they claim to propound the complete understanding of all kinds of grasping,
